mapper.select:
/*tbl_order 에서 데이터를 가져온다. 이때 orderDeliveryInfo인 경우와 exchangePaybackInfo인 경우. 두가지를 생각해야 한다.*/ /* userCode, OrderDTO order, info*/ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tbl_order A
A.state IN('환불중','환불완료','교환중','교환완료')
A.state = '환불중'
A.state = '환불완료'
A.state = '교환중'
A.state = '교환완료'
A.state = '배송대기'
A.state = '배송중'
A.state = '배송완료'
AND A.customer_code = #{userCode} AND A.creation_date BETWEEN #{order.dateStart} AND #{order.dateEnd}

SELECT A.order_code, A.creation_date, B.convert_path, A.product_code, D.product_name, SUM(C.count) product_count, SUM(C.cost_price) cost_price, SUM(C.delivery_charge) delivery_charge, SUM(C.reduced_price) reduced_price, A.point_usage, SUM(C.point_charge) point_charge, A.state FROM tbl_order A JOIN tbl_product_img B ON A.product_code = B.product_code JOIN tbl_order_details C ON A.order_code = C.order_code JOIN tbl_product D ON A.product_code = D.product_code
A.state IN('환불중','환불완료','교환중','교환완료')
A.state = '환불중'
A.state = '환불완료'
A.state = '교환중'
A.state = '교환완료'
A.state = '배송대기'
A.state = '배송중'
A.state = '배송완료'
AND A.customer_code = #{userCode} AND A.creation_date BETWEEN #{orderDetailsSelectCriteria.order.dateStart} AND #{orderDetailsSelectCriteria.order.dateEnd} AND B.image_classification = 'Thumbnails'
GROUP BY A.order_code LIMIT #{orderDetailsSelectCriteria.startRow}, #{orderDetailsSelectCriteria.limit}

SELECT A.order_code order_code, A.customer_code order_customer_code, A.creation_date order_creation_date, A.point_usage point_usage, A.state order_state, C.delivery_code delivery_code, C.delivery_address delivery_address, C.delivery_requests delivery_request, C.arrival_time arrival_time, C.recipient_name recipient_name, C.recipient_phone recipient_phone, C.state delivery_state, D.payment_code payment_code, D.details payment_details, D.complete_state payment_complete_state, D.date payment_complete_date, D.state payment_state, E.exchange_code exchange_code, E.date exchange_date, E.cause exchange_cause, E.inquiry_code exchange_inquiry_code, F.refund_code refund_code, F.date refund_date, F.cause refund_cause, F.inquiry_code refund_inquiry_code, G.order_details_code order_details_code, G.count count, G.product_code product_code, I.product_name product_name, J.convert_path product_image_path, H.option_code option_code, H.name option_name, G.delivery_charge delivery_charge, G.point_charge point_charge, G.reduced_price reduced_price, G.cost_price cost_price, G.final_price final_price, G.review_point review_point FROM tbl_order A JOIN tbl_order_list B ON A.order_code = B.order_code JOIN tbl_delivery C ON B.delivery_code = C.delivery_code JOIN tbl_payment D ON B.payment_code = D.payment_code LEFT JOIN tbl_exchange E ON D.payment_code = E.payment_code LEFT JOIN tbl_refund F ON D.payment_code = F.payment_code JOIN tbl_order_details G ON A.order_code = G.order_code JOIN tbl_option H ON G.option_code = H.option_code JOIN tbl_product I ON G.product_code = I.product_code JOIN tbl_product_img J ON G.product_code = J.product_code WHERE A.order_code = #{orderCode} AND J.image_classification = 'Thumbnails'
